freeTier: The live demos are deployed on free tier hosting services with limitations, please give them 2~5min to load up.
TodoListContent: A simple Todo-List web app I created for the purpose of learning fullstack web development.
MyWebsite: I built this portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
Destruction4Dummies: During the Games Lab course 2019 I and two other students developed a 2.5D Jump&Run with level editor.
RhythmDungeon: Together with two other students we made a 2D-Dungeon-RPG with the Microsoft Kinect.In this game you use your body to control the character and attack enemies.
Groceryou: Together with three other students we made a private to private grocery delivery web application.
SoaperDuck: In the Games Lab course 2020 I and three other students developed an endless runner.
BachelorThesisContent: In my bachelor's thesis, I extend an existing Japanese language learning serious games with new features and content. I implemented a Hiragana Mnemonics Training, a Drag&Drop minigame and used a point-cloud based algorithm to detect correct handwriting of Japanese letters.
MasterThesisContent: The goal of my master's thesis was to add Dynamic Difficulty Adjustment (DDA) to the project from my Bachelor thesis. The basic idea of DDA is to measure the playerâ€™s performance, analyze the data and based on the results make adjustments to difficulty factors within the application.
MutationTesting: Mutation testing is the process of making small code changes to your code and checking whether or not your unit test cases can detect those changes.
PythonForJavaDevelopersContent: Lecture slides I made for Prof. Dr. Georg Groh. The slides introduce the programming language Python to students with prior knowledge in Java.
PGdPContent: I created over 600 slides to teach first semester students the basics of programming in Java.
SocialGamingTutorialContent: An example implementation tutorial I made for the Social Gaming Lab Course. This tutorial introduces the students to the following concepts: Android Studio, a simple REST API with Spring Boot, how to save JSON data into MongoDB, Firebase Authentication, and Open Street Maps integration.
DefendersOfEarth: Old AR multiplayer shooter made with Unity, Firebase, and Mirror
GlobalGalaxy: My very first game I ever made.
